availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Mary Carpenter Clore in Oldham County, Kentucky, in March 1839. Father of Henry Clore, Albert Early Clore, Mary Clore, and Joel Clore. Married to Mary E. Featheringill Clore in Oldham County on December 9, 1849. Father of Zach Clore and Lee Clore. Farmer in Oldham County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1850. Farmer in Oldham County in 1860. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1860.
